short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find & engage suitable candidates on LinkedIn with HeyTalent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine, startup founders, amidst the whirlwind of building your next big idea, the daunting task of recruiting is made simple. No longer sift through stacks of resumes or spend limited funds on extensive recruitment processes. With HeyTalent, just upload a JD, and you're well on your way to finding the best minds to join your journey.

For Agency-Based Talent Acquisition Managers, gone are the days of manual profile scouting and generic outreach. HeyTalent ensures that every candidate approached is a potential fit, with messages that are both personal and professional.

âœ¨ Key Features:

JD-Powered Searches: Just upload a job description and let our AI identify potential candidates.
Integrated with LinkedIn: Directly engage with candidates where they're most active.
Personalized Messaging: Crafted to appeal to each candidate, increasing your chances of a positive response.
Startup founders, ensure your limited resources yield the best talent. Talent Acquisition Managers, make every outreach count. With HeyTalent, every connection is a step closer to the perfect match.
